messages.message: Thanks for reaching out. What is your strength when it comes to software development?
I like all forms, front end, back end, user testing, DevOps.

The reason I ask is that we're about to hire and your background looks interesting. Our pressing needs are in front-end and QA. I'll reach out again in a couple months to see if it's something you're interested in.
Sounds good.. I've done a lot with selenium automation for QA too.
